summary: A mad scientist transferring a dead woman in a freezer with an armed guard on a plane to Paris. After a bit of turbulence, the freezer breaks down and she is awake, then turns into a zombie and starts to infect all on board.
cast: David Chisum|Kristen Kerr|Kevin J. O'Connor|Richard Tyson|Erick Avari|Todd Babcock|Derek Webster|Siena Goines|Mieko Hillman|Raymond J. Barry|Serah D'Laine|Brian Ames|Brian Kolodziej|Ashley Bashioum|Laura Cayouette|Dale Midkiff|Brian Thompson|Tucker Smallwood|David Spielberg|Heidi Marnhout|Cliff Weissman|Eric Price|Michael Tomlinson|Ingrid Raines|Claudia Katz Minnick|David Feldman|Takashi Masunaga|Richard Murken|Megan Wagner|Amelia Beaugard|Lisa Carletto|Michael Redford Carney|Bryeon Earle|Nicholas Garren|Darrel Guilbeau|Elza Minor|Alan Rackley|Ricky Russert|Joseph Weber-Grubbs|Tennille Williams
title: Plane Dead
